Is there a way to learn more about Verus and its community without visiting the official website?

Actually, the official website, https://veruscoin.io, is a great resource to get involved with Verus and its community. Additionally, there are other resources listed, such as guides, spotlights, and articles, that provide more information about Verus.

Is VerusCoin only focused on Proof of Stake consensus algorithms?

No, VerusCoin is not only focused on Proof of Stake consensus algorithms. In fact, one of the resources listed is an article about how Verus solved Nothing at Stake and Weak Subjectivity for Proof of Work, which suggests that Verus is also involved with Proof of Work consensus algorithms.

Is there no foundation for VerusCoin?
Actually, there is a foundation for VerusCoin. The formation of The Verus Coin Foundation is mentioned, which has a vision of PBaaS (Private Blockchain as a Service).
